Html:
Use a committed OST to PST Converter solution to export data from corrupted or orphaned OST file into Outlook PST file format. Application provides quick and accurate recovery process to repair corruptions and move entire data from offline OST to PST format. Permanently deleted items (emails, contacts & tasks etc) can be recovered using this powerful solution.

Downlaod:- http://www.recoverydeletedfiles.com/ost-to-pst-converter.html

If you are working with Outlook on off-line and you want to directly convert Outlook OST to PST files. Now use 3rd party OST to PST Converter software.

Download:- http://www.pcrecoverytools.com/convert-ost-to-pst.html

Use Kernel for OST to PST conversion tool and recover corrupted OST files. This software also quickly convert OST files in PST files. For more information
http://www.osttopstconvert.recoveryfiles.org
